snippet.title: Spyrazoid Crypto - Round 1 Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Introducing Spyrazoid, a minimalist puzzle game available on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyrazoid/id1585455563

In Spyrazoid Crypto, it's all about numbers.  Spin the hexagons until the sum of the surrounding pieces matches the value in the center.  Sounds simple, but when the numbers reach double (and even triple) digits you will be seeing numbers everywhere.  And with infinite randomly-generated boards for 14 levels of difficulty, the fun never ends.  How many rounds can you complete?

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyrazoid/?mode=crypto

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyrazoid #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
